TEXT.Italian: I Governatori cittadini costruiscono le Chiatte
TEXT.Spanish: Los Gobernadores de las Ciudades Construir Pesqueros

TEXT.English: City governors can build Workboats when needed
TEXT.French: City governors can build Workboats when needed
TEXT.German: City governors can build Workboats when needed
TEXT.Italian: I Governatori cittadini possono costruire le Chiatte quando è necessario
TEXT.Spanish: Los gobernadores de las ciudades pueden construir Pesqueros

TEXT.Italian: I Governatori cittadini costruiscono i Lavoratori
TEXT.Spanish: Los Gobernadores de las Ciudades Construir Trabajadores

TEXT.English: City governors can build Workers when needed
TEXT.French: City governors can build Workers when needed
TEXT.German: City governors can build Workers when needed
TEXT.Italian: I Governatori cittadini possono costruire i Lavoratori quando è necessario
TEXT.Spanish: Los gobernadores de las ciudades pueden construir Trabajadores
